import React from 'react'; import { Card, Media, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; //i18n import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; function FileList(props) { /* intilize t variable for multi language implementation */ const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{props.fileName}

{props.fileSize}
    • {t('Share')} {t('Delete')}
); } export default FileList;
